Title: Asterix at the Olympic Games
Writer: René Goscinny, Albert Uderzo, Thomas Langmann
Actors: Gérard Depardieu, Clovis Cornillac, Benoît Poelvoorde
Plot: The Roman Brutus plans to marry Irina, the princess of Greece, but the Gaul Lovesix wants to prevent this from happening. To get her attention, his strategy is to win the Olympics, with the help of Asterix and Obelix.
